22.question: How can I call super in a script?
22.answer: just call $super in the script -- without defining it as a parameter. $super will look up the next method implementation in the object's prototype chain.

32.name: QandAText
32.savedTextString:
How can I call super in a script?
jenslincke -- 6/3/2011, 14:34:30

just call $super in the script -- without defining it as a parameter. $super will look up the next method implementation in the object's prototype chain.

415.comment: The Lively Help. A widget that lets you ask questions from whatever world you are in. Answers can be submitted either from the same page or through the "global" mode (use button in the upper right corner to switch).
